snippet: The government is in the midst of putting in place a tough new policy intended to stem the influx of African immigrants and asylum seekers.
abstract: Israel announces that it will admit 3 of 21 African migrants waiting in the desert behind a new steel fence the country had built along its border with Egypt; Israeli government had originally vowed not to allow any of them entry as part of its new, tough policy intended to stem the influx of African migrants and asylum seekers.
lead_paragraph: The government is in the midst of putting in place a tough new policy intended to stem the influx of African immigrants and asylum seekers.

headline.seo: Israel to Admit 3 of 21 Africans Waiting in Desert
headline.main: Israel to Admit 3 of 21 Africans Waiting in Desert
headline.print_headline: Israel Says It Will Admit 3 of 21 Africans Waiting in Desert
